title: Route 627 Moorabbin to Chadstone via Bentleigh
articleContent:
A new route between Chadstone and Murrumbeena makes it easier for residents to travel to neighbouring suburbs and access shopping and leisure activities at East Village and Chadstone Shopping Centre.

Route 627 will connect with trains at Murrumbeena station giving onward public transport options on the metropolitan and regional services.

Route 627 will start from Sunday, 16 June and run seven days a week from 6am to 10pm Monday to Friday, 7am to 9:30pm on Saturdays and 8am to 9pm on Sundays.

The new timetable is available online and in Journey planner. To order a printed copy, call 1800 800 007.

Route 627 map
